page.title: 08 EVENTS IN KENNINGTON
page.content: Every year, many fundraising events are organised in{KENNINGTON.}Summer fetes are annual features. You can partake in many stalls. There is usually a cake and books stall, also a tombola.{KENNINGTON JUNIOR SCHOOL} holds{MAYDAY}celebrations. A{MAYQUEEN} is elected and there is dancing around a{MAYPOLE.}There is also a fete. An unsual name for a stall is {WHITE {ELEPHANT}where 'neraly new' articles are sold. Jumble sales are held by the schools, the{WOMEN'S INSTITUTE}and {ST {MARY'S CHURCH, KENNINGTON.}A jumble sale is a sale of second-hand clothes, books and toys.{THE CRICKET CLUB} organises some fundraises events, and their annual school event is{SPORTS' {DAY}when pupils compete in races. (This is non-fundraising). They take a lot of organising.
